name: Becky
placeOfBirth: Lake Davidmouth, British Indian Ocean Territory (Chagos Archipelago)
description: Becky is a blue-eyed llama with blonde hair, standing 130 cm tall. Originally from Lake Davidmouth, British Indian Ocean Territory (Chagos Archipelago), Becky enjoys dancing, painting, gardening. Known for their curious and gentle personality, Becky is a beloved member of the llama community.
